## chart_popups

## Description
 Set up Flourish popups 


## Usage
```r
 
chart_popups( 
  ., 
  popup_position = NULL, 
  popup_open_duration = NULL, 
  popup_side_fixed = NULL, 
  popup_side_default_content = NULL, 
  popup_custom_header = NULL, 
  popup_custom_main_text = NULL, 
  popup_width_percent = NULL, 
  popup_height_percent = NULL, 
  popup_text_color = NULL, 
  popup_font_size = NULL, 
  popup_align = NULL, 
  popup_header_type = NULL, 
  popup_header_background_color = NULL, 
  popup_header_text_color = NULL, 
  popup_background_color = NULL, 
  popup_background_opacity = NULL, 
  popup_padding = NULL, 
  popup_radius = NULL, 
  popup_list_type = NULL, 
  popup_list_label_weight = NULL, 
  popup_list_separator = NULL, 
  popup_shadow = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_position = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_open_duration = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_side_fixed = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_side_default_content = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_custom_header = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_custom_main_text = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_width = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_text_color = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_font_size = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_align = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_header_type = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_header_background_color = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_header_text_color = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_background_color = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_background_opacity = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_padding = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_radius = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_list_type = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_list_label_weight = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_list_separator = NULL, 
  map_point_popup_shadow = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_position = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_open_duration = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_side_fixed = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_side_default_content = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_custom_header = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_custom_main_text = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_text_color = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_font_size = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_align = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_header_type = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_header_background_color = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_header_text_color = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_background_color = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_background_opacity = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_padding = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_radius = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_list_type = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_list_label_weight = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_list_separator = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_shadow = NULL, 
  map_region_popup_width = NULL, 
  hierarchy_popup_active_levels = NULL, 
  time_map_popup_periodic_enabled = NULL, 
  time_map_popup_periodic_cull = NULL, 
  time_map_popup_periodic_interval = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| popup_position | Position on graph: "overlay", "left", "right", "top", "bottom". |
| popup_open_duration | Time (in seconds) that the popup will remain visible. |
| popup_side_fixed | Boolean (True/False) for whether the popup is fixed to the graph (user cannot click out of the popup). |
| popup_side_default_content | Default content for the side popup (HTML). |
| popup_custom_header | Popup custom header. The text to appear in the popup. You can use ` {{column_name}} ` to add a value from your data. It must be in a selected column, but you can add columns to “Metadata” if you just want to include them for use in the popup. You can also use ` {{NAME}} ` to include the name of the current item, ` {{VALUE}} ` to include the value of the current item and ` {{SIZEBY}} ` to include the name of the column chosen to size items. Advanced users can include HTML to apply layouts, formatting, images, etc. You can also hide content based on a column name being empty using ` {{# if column_name}} `Text to display when column_name is not empty` {{/if}} `. For example: ` {{Country}} ` ` {{#if Capital}} `(Capital: ` {{Capital}} `)` {{/if}} `. |
| popup_custom_main_text | Popup custom main content. The text to appear in the popup. You can use ` {{column_name}} ` to add a value from your data. It must be in a selected column, but you can add columns to “Metadata” if you just want to include them for use in the popup. You can also use ` {{NAME}} ` to include the name of the current item, ` {{VALUE}} ` to include the value of the current item and ` {{SIZEBY}} ` to include the name of the column chosen to size items. Advanced users can include HTML to apply layouts, formatting, images, etc. You can also hide content based on a column name being empty using ` {{# if column_name}} `Text to display when column_name is not empty` {{/if}} `. For example: ` {{Country}} ` ` {{#if Capital}} `(Capital: ` {{Capital}} `)` {{/if}} `. |
| popup_width_percent | Width (%). |
| popup_height_percent | Height (%). |
| popup_text_color | Text color. |
| popup_font_size | Text size. |
| popup_align | Alignment. Allowed values: "start", "center", "end". |
| popup_header_type | Header style. Allowed values: "block", "inline". |
| popup_header_background_color | Header background color. |
| popup_header_text_color | Header text color. |
| popup_background_color | Background color. |
| popup_background_opacity | Background opacity. Max value: 1. |
| popup_padding | Popup padding. |
| popup_radius | Corner radius of popup. |
| popup_list_type | List type. Allowed values: "table", "ul". |
| popup_list_label_weight | Label weight: "normal", "bold". |
| popup_list_separator | List separator. Allowed values: ":", "-", (empty space), `"<br />"` |
| popup_shadow | Popup shadow. Boolean (True/False). |
| map_point_popup_position | Position on graph: "overlay", "left", "right", "top", "bottom". |

| time_map_popup_periodic_cull | Only cycle through visible points. Points out of the frame will not be selected when cycling through popups. Boolean (True/False). |
| time_map_popup_periodic_interval | Cycle interval(s). Only update popups at the beginning of every cycle interval, measured in seconds. This can be useful if you have lots of points to cycle through, as it can help the visualisation run more smoothly and provide less erratic results. Set this to zero to disable. |
